st: Lamha-lamha ye waqt gujar jayega,
s:
Lamha-lamha ye waqt gujar jayega,
Pal do pal mein ye safar yuhi kat jayega,
Abhi waqt hai to do chaar baatein kar lo,
Kaun jaane kab zindagi mein koi aur aa jayega.

st: ek Pal Ka Ehsaas Bankar Aate Ho Tum,
s:
ek Pal Ka Ehsaas Bankar Aate Ho Tum,
Dosre Hi Pal Khawab Bankar Ud Jate Ho Tum,
Jante Ho Ki Lagta Hai Dar Tanhaiyo se,
Phir Bhi Baar-Baar Tanha Chod jaate ho Tum.

st: Hath se hath chudane lage ho,
s:
Hath se hath chudane lage ho,
Mujhko pathar ka banane lage ho,
Zara thehro mein yakeen to kar loon,
Tum mujhe chod ke jaane lage ho.

st: Use kehna maje mein hai hum,
s:
Use kehna maje mein hai hum,
Bas zara yaade satati hai,
Uski doori ka gum nahi mujhe,
Bus zara aankhie bheeg jati hai.

st: Wo Kisi Ki Dil Lagi Ko Saza Samjhne Lage,
s:
Wo Kisi Ki Dil Lagi Ko Saza Samjhne Lage,
Do Pal Ruth Ke Guzare, To Jafa Samjhne Lage,
Wo Kya Jaane Ke Hum Kitna Roye Unke Bagair,
Wo to bas yuhi Mujhe Bewafa Samjhne Lage.

st: Hum ne to jaan luta di pyar mein,
s:
Hum ne to jaan luta di pyar mein,
Mehboob ne hi dhokha de diya hume,
Hum ne to khushiyan maangi thi,
Usne zindagi bhar kaa gham de diya.

st: Yeh kya naam du iss deewangi ko,
s:
Yeh kya naam du iss deewangi ko,
Dil ki bechainiya tadapane lagi hai,
Bata kya kahu iss rawanagi se,
Jo pal-pal mujhe bulane lagi hai.

st: Zanaza mera uth raha tha,
s:
Zanaza mera uth raha tha,
fir be takleef thi unko aane mein,
Bewafa ghar mein baithe puch rahe the,
Or kitni dair hai use dafnane mein.

st: Tanhai Jad Kismat Che Likhi Hai,
s:
Tanhai Jad Kismat Che Likhi Hai,
Teh Ki Shikayat Apne To Begane Nu,
Asi Mit Gaye Jinna Di Chah Wich,
Oh Baaz Nahi Aande Sanu Ajmaun che.

st: Bahut Samjhaya Tha Dil Ne mujhe,
s:
Bahut Samjhaya Tha Dil Ne mujhe,
Ye Haseena Kisi Ki Talabgar Nahi Hoti,
Nahi Hota Inka Vasta Wafa Se kabhi,
Ye Kisi Ki Chahat Ki Haqdaar Nahi Hoti.

st: Chand ne ki hogi suraj se mohhabat,
s:
Chand ne ki hogi suraj se mohhabat,
isliye to chand main daag hai,
mumkin hai chand se hui hogi bewafai,
isliye to suraj main itni aag hai.

st: गैर जो ले बोसा तुम्हारा तो तुम्हे बुरा नहीं लगता,
s:
गैर जो ले बोसा तुम्हारा तो तुम्हे बुरा नहीं लगता,
हमसे गले मिलने में भी तुम्हे तकलीफ होती है,
दिल के पन्नों पर तेरे नाम लिखे थे मैंने,
जबसे की है तूने बेवफाई तबसे मेरी तहरीर रोती है.

st: Ek Pal Bhi Dekhna hame Gawara Nahi Use,
s:
Ek Pal Bhi Dekhna hame Gawara Nahi Use,
Zara Bhi Ehsaas Hamara raha Nahi Use,
Wo Sahil Se Dekhta Raha Doobna Mera,
Hum Bhi Doobte Rahe Par Pukaara Nahi Use.

st: Chahte the jinhe unke dil badal gaye,
s:
Chahte the jinhe unke dil badal gaye,
Samundar to wohi the par sahil badal gaye,
Qatal aisa hua kissto mein main mera,
Kabhi badle khanjar to kabhi Qaatil badal gaye.

st: Pathaar ki pooja kar baithe hum naada the,
s:
Pathaar ki pooja kar baithe hum naada the,
Teri aadat teri fitrat se anjaan the,
Waqt ne hame khilona bana diya yaaro,
warna hum bhi kabhi mehfilon ki jaan the.

st: Sab Kuch Mila Bus Khudai Ke Siwa,
s:
Sab Kuch Mila Bus Khudai Ke Siwa,
Zindagi Bahut Pasand Aayi Ruswai Ke Siwa,
Meri Chahat Ka Ehsaas Bhi Na Hoga,
Uski Har Adaa Pasand Aayi Bewafai Ke Siwa.

st: Aye mera janaza uthane waalo,
s:
Aye mera janaza uthane waalo,
Dekhna koi bewafa mere paas na ho,
Agar ho to usse kehna, ki
Aaj to khushi ka mauka hai yu udaas na ho.

st: Duniya mein jeene ki chahat na hoti,
s:
Duniya mein jeene ki chahat na hoti,
Agar khuda ne mohabbat banayi na hoti,
Log marne ki aarzoo na karte,
Agar mohabbat me bewafai na hoti.

st: Chaha tha jise use bhulaya na gaya,
s:
Chaha tha jise use bhulaya na gaya,
Zakhm dil ka logo se chupaya na gaya,
Bewafai ke baad bhi itna pyar karta hai dil unse,
Ki bewafai ka ilzaam bhi uss par lagaya na gaya.

st: Tumhe’n chahne ki saza hamne paayi,
s:
Tumhe’n chahne ki saza hamne paayi,
Tumse dil lagane ki daga hamne khayi,
Agar karni thi humse yun hi bewafai,
To fir kyun iss dil mein apni jagah banayi.

st: Pathar ki pooja kar baithe hum nadan the,
s:
Pathar ki pooja kar baithe hum nadan the,
uski aadat, uski Fitarat se anjaan the,
waqt ne hamko khilona bana diya yaro,
warna hum bhi kabhi kisi ki jaan the.

st: Pyaar Kar Ke Use Dil Se Mitana Muskil Tha,
s:
Pyaar Kar Ke Use Dil Se Mitana Muskil Tha,
Wo Tufaan Palko Mein Rok Pana Muskil Tha,
Asaan Laga Use Yaad Kar Ke Mar Jana,
Kyuki Bhool Ke Use jee Pana Muskil Tha.

st: Meri Kalam Se Lafz Kho Gaye Shayad,
s:
Meri Kalam Se Lafz Kho Gaye Shayad,
Aaj phir se Wo Bewafa Ho Gaye Shayad,
Jab Neend Khuli To Palko Mein tha Paani,
Mere Khawab Mujh Pe Hi Roo Gaye Shayad.

st: Ehsaan Kiya Usne Mujhe Pyaar Sikha Kar,
s:
Ehsaan Kiya Usne Mujhe Pyaar Sikha Kar,
Kya Hoti Hai Chahat Ye Mujh Ko Bata Kar,
Judai Hota Hai Pyaar Ka Asli Matlab,
Chod Diya Mera Saath Bas Itna Batakar.

st: Najre Mile ab Ek Zamana Ho Gaya,
s:
Najre Mile ab Ek Zamana Ho Gaya,
Aisa Lagta Hai Apna Koi Begana Ho Gaya,
Wo To Chale Gaye Humse bewafa karke,
Mushqil Iss dil  Ko ab Samjhana Ho Gaya.

st: Bohat Udhas Hai Koi Shaqs Tere Jaane Se,
s:
Bohat Udhas Hai Koi Shaqs Tere Jaane Se,
Ho Sake To Laut Aa Kisi Bahane Se,
Tu Laakh Khafa Sahi Magar ek Baar To Dekh,
Koi Toot sa Gaya Hai Tere Rooth Jaane Se.

st: Meri gali se wo jab bhi gujarta hoga,
s:
Meri gali se wo jab bhi gujarta hoga,
Mod pe jaake kuch der theharta hoga,
Bhool jana mujko itna asaan to n hoga,
Dil mein kuch toot ke to bikharta hoga.

st: Mila Ke Nazar, Nazar Loot Lenge,
s:
Mila Ke Nazar, Nazar Loot Lenge,
Yeh Bewafa Jalwe Jigar Loot Lenge,
Hasino Pe Hargiz Bharosa Mat Karna Dost,
Maa Kasam Ghar Ke sukoon-e-chain Loot Lenge.

st: Ashqon Se Nahi Bujhte Shole Dard-e-Pyaar ke,
s:
Ashqon Se Nahi Bujhte Shole Dard-e-Pyaar ke,
Maut Bhali Aise itne Lambe Intezaar Se,
Marte Hai Roz ham Bina Dedar-e-Yaar Ke,
Tanhai Acche Thi Uss bewafa Ke Pyaar Se.

st: Mujhe Miti Ke Ghar Banane Ka Shok Tha,
s:
Mujhe Miti Ke Ghar Banane Ka Shok Tha,
Use Aashiyane Girane Ka Shok Tha,
Wo Bewafa Tha Is Mein Hairat Ki Baat Kya Hai,
Mujhe Bhi Bewafa Logo Se Dil Lagane Ka Shok tha.

st: Tere Janam-Din Par Tujhe Kya Pesh Karu,
s:
Tere Janam-Din Par Tujhe Kya Pesh Karu,
Tajmahal Du Tujhe Ya Chanda mama Pesh Karu,
Aur To Kuch Nahi Mere Pass Aye Mere Sanam,
Sochta Hu Bas Tujhe Apni wafa ko Pesh Karu.

st: Itni Chahat Ki Uss Se Ki Inteha Ho Gayi,
s:
Itni Chahat Ki Uss Se Ki Inteha Ho Gayi,
Wo Mohabbat Kar Ke Phir Bewafa Ho Gayi,
Main To Bas Chahta Raha Toot Kar Use din-raat,
Bas Yahi To ek Mujh Se ab Khata Ho Gayi.

st: Mohabbat ne aaj humko rula diya,
s:
Mohabbat ne aaj humko rula diya,
Jis par marte rahe usi ne bhula diya,
Hum to unki yaad me aanhsu peete gaye,
ek din usne anhsuo me bhi zeher mila diya.

st: Wo Hans Kar Mile Ham Pyar Samjh Baithe,
s:
Wo Hans Kar Mile Ham Pyar Samjh Baithe,
Faqat Ulfat Ko Hi Izhaar Samjh Baithe,
Itni Aache to Na thi kismat Humari,
Khud Ko Unn Ki Chahat Ka Haqdar Samjh Baithe.

st: Ek Khushi ki chaah mein har khushi se door hue hum,
s:
Ek Khushi ki chaah mein har khushi se door hue hum,
Kisi se kuch keh bhi na sake itne majbur hue hum,
Na aayi unhe nibhaani pyar mein wafa,
Aur zamane ki najar mein bewafa ke naam se mashur hue hum.

st: Bin unke zindagi mein koi Khusi Nahi,
s:
Bin unke zindagi mein koi Khusi Nahi,
wo nahi to aaj labo par Hansi Nahi,
Na samjha wo agar to hum kya kare,
Iss Dil me unke siwa kisi or ki jagah Nahi.

st: Bhula Ke Mujhko Agar Tum Ho Salamat,
s:
Bhula Ke Mujhko Agar Tum Ho Salamat,
To Bhula Ke Tujhko Sambhlna Mujhe Bhi Aata Hai,
Nahi Hai Meri Fitrat Main Ye Aadat,
Warna Teri Tarha Badalna Mujhe Bhi Aata Hai.

st: Ajeeb shaqs tha kaisa mizaj rakhta tha,
s:
Ajeeb shaqs tha kaisa mizaj rakhta tha,
Sath reh kar bhi ikhtilaf rakhta tha,
Mohabbat to use thi kisi aur se shayad,
Hum se to yuhi hansi mazak rakhta tha.

st: Fareb tha hasi mein hum aashiqi samajh baithe,
s:
Fareb tha hasi mein hum aashiqi samajh baithe,
Maut ko bhi apni hum zindagi samajh baihe,
Waqt kar raha tha mazak ya thi ye badnasibi meri,
Unki do baato ko ham apni chahat samaj bathe.

st: Pyaar Karne Waale aashiq kabhi  Darte Nahi,
s:
Pyaar Karne Waale aashiq kabhi  Darte Nahi,
Log Majnu Kehte Hai Par Wo kabhi Chidte Nahi,
Hamare Pyaar Ki Mashuriya Koi to Dekhe,
ab to ham unhe bhi bewafa ke sakte nahi.

st: Kya Gila Kare Ham Unse Bewafai Ka,
s:
Kya Gila Kare Ham Unse Bewafai Ka,
Ham Khud Hi Laye The Mausam Tanhai Ka,
Wo To Milo Door chale gaye The Hamse,
Ham Hi Picha Karte Rahe Unki Parchayi Ka.

st: Tu kabhi Bewafa Hogi Socha Hi Na Tha,
s:
Tu kabhi Bewafa Hogi Socha Hi Na Tha,
Tu Bhi Kabhi Khafa Hogi Socha Hi Na Tha,
Jo Ghazal Likhi The Kabhi Pyaar Par Tere,
Wahi ghazal Ruswa Honge Socha Hi Na Tha.

st: Khuda Ne Kaash Mohabbat Banayi Na Hoti,
s:
Khuda Ne Kaash Mohabbat Banayi Na Hoti,
Toh Aaj Iss Tarah Hamare Pyar Ki Ruswayi Na Hoti,
Kaash Unke Dil Mein Zara Si jo Wafa Hoti,
To Iss Tarah Mere Sath aaj Bewafai Na Hoti.

st: Naam likh ke uss ne mera mitaya hoga,
s:
Naam likh ke uss ne mera mitaya hoga,
Soo baar usko meri yaadon ne rulaya hoga,
Uss ke chehre pe mera naam likha hai yaaro,
Uss ne kis kis se ye mera naam chupaya hoga.

st: Hum to tere dil ki mehfil sajane aaye they,
s:
Hum to tere dil ki mehfil sajane aaye they,
teri kasam tujhe apna ham banane aaye they,
kis baat ki saza di tune ham ko aye sanam,
bewafa hum to tere dard ko apnane aaye they.

st: Hamare ansoo ki pyali hi jaam ho gayi,
s:
Hamare ansoo ki pyali hi jaam ho gayi,
Izzat bhi hamari ab to neelam ho gayi,
Kyu use bewafa ki raah takti hai ye nazar,
Ab to nazar bhi gairo ki gulam ho gayi.

st: Nikal gaye mere paas se iss kadar,
s:
Nikal gaye mere paas se iss kadar,
Jaise ki mujhe pehchante hi  nahi,
Kitne zakham khaye hai dil ne mere,
Phir bhi use bewafa ham mante nahi.

st: Sab Kuch Mila Bas ek Khudai Ke Siwa
s:
Sab Kuch Mila Bas ek Khudai Ke Siwa
Zindagi Bohat Pasand Aayi Ruswayi Ke Siwa,
Meri Chahat Ka Ehsaas Bhi Na Hoga use,
Uski Har Adaa Pasand Aayi Bewafayi Ke Siwa.

st: Ek Dil Mere Dil Ko gehra Zakham De Gaya,
s:
Ek Dil Mere Dil Ko gehra Zakham De Gaya,
Zindagi Bhar jeene ki Kasam De Gaya,
Lakho Phulon Mein Se Phool Chuna Hamne,
Jo Kanto Se Gehri bhi Chubhan De Gaya.

st: Dilo’n ko saudagar hazar mil jayenge,
s:
Dilo’n ko saudagar hazar mil jayenge,
Tumko daga dene wale bar-bar mil jayenge,
Milega na tum ko hum jaisa koi hamsafar,
Milne ko to dost yaha hazaar mil jayenge.

st: Wo pyaar mein hamara imtehan kya legi,
s:
Wo pyaar mein hamara imtehan kya legi,
milegi najar se najare to najar zukha legi,
Use meri mayyat pe diya jalane ko na kehna,
wo nadan hai dosto apne haath jaala legi.

st: Na-jaane kyu khayal aata hai mujhe,
s:
Na-jaane kyu khayal aata hai mujhe,
Jaise aaj se pehle kahi dekha hai tujhe,
bus kuch palo’n ki hi baat ho jaise,
tanha Chod ke chal diya tha tu mujhe.

st: Dard ab aur na de aye khuda main ab seh nahi sakta,
s:
Dard ab aur na de aye khuda main ab seh nahi sakta,
Tu sunta nahi aur main kisi aur se keh bhi nahi sakta,
Wo zakham aise de gaya jo jaate nahi sahe mujhse,
maut aati nahi aur main zinda rehne ki bhik maang nhi sakta.
